import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Sections = () => { let allDetails; useEffect(() => { allDetails = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('details') || {}); setLsDetails(allDetails) }) const [lsDetails, setLsDetails] = useState("") return (

Course Sections
You can always edit your details even after saved

Course Title: {lsDetails.title}
Add
Holy guacamole!
Chose section for this description
Add
Holy guacamole!You should check in on some of those fields below.
) } export default Sections
